output.description: The response from the SignNow API
output.title: Response

meta.name: Send E-Docs for Signature
meta.description: Sends a document for signature using SignNow API

group.name: SignNow
group.description: Nodes for Sending and processing Electronic signatures for online documents

bearer_token.description: Authorization token for the SignNow API. You can get the Basic access token from the dashboard and get the bearer token from there. Refer to this [documentation](https://docs.signnow.com/docs/signnow/account#api-dashboard).
bearer_token.title: API Key

subject.description: Subject of the email to be sent
subject.title: Subject

message.description: Message of the email to be sent
message.title: Message

document_id.description: ID of the document to be signed. You can get the ID from the dashboard.
document_id.title: Document ID
